EventType.description: Basic type that contains all properties common to an event, conference, or some other type of function.

venue.description: The name of the venue where the event occurred.

when.description: The start and end date when the event occurred.

LicenseType.title: LicenseType
LicenseType.description: Authoritative permission to hold a certain status or to do certain things, e.g. to practise some trade or profession. (OED license, n. a. A formal, usually a printed or written permission from a constituted authority to do something. b. The document embodying such a permission.)

endorsements.description: The modifications to the base license as authorized by the issuing authority that allow for additional access or grant additional qualifications. Examples include different variations of drivers or pilot licenses that allow for additional vehicles to be operated.

restrictions.description: The modifications to the base license as authorized by the issuing authority that restrict access or remove permissions or authority. Examples include requiring vision ware while operating a motor vehicle, or requiring an additional licensed operator to accompany the licensee while operating a vehicle.

violations.description: The violations or transgressions against the license as per the licensing authority or other authorities. Examples include points violations on a drivers license due to speeding.

PatentType.title: PatentType
PatentType.description: Basic type that contains all properties common to represent a patent.

title.description: The patent title as registered with the government organization.

inventorNames.description: The list of inventors who are registered on the patent.

assigneeNames.description: The list of assignees who are registered on the patent.

issuingAuthority.description: The agency under which the patent is registered.

status.description: The current status of the patent. Statuses include filed, pending, issued.

BaseHistoryType.title: BaseHistoryType
BaseHistoryType.description: Basic type that contains all properties common to a person's profile history entry - intended for use in education history, employment history or military history.

id.description: The identifier for the history.

start.description: The start date of the history if known.

end.description: The end date of the history if known.

current.description: Indicator that the person's history entry is currently active (i.e. if education, still at the school. If work history, still working at the organization)

attachmentReferences.description: Attachment references supporting the history entry.

descriptions.description: Additional details or descriptions about the history entry.

PersonProfileType.title: PersonProfileType
PersonProfileType.description: Represents person along with profile data.

CertificationType.title: CertificationType
CertificationType.description: A document or confirmation certifying the status or acquirements of the bearer, or his fulfillment of conditions which authorize him to act or practise in a specified way; hence, often equal to a certificate.

id.description: A unique identifier to the certificate as defined by the issuing authority.

name.description: The common name of the certificate.

type.description: The type of the certificate.

status.description: The status of the certificate. While this is an open string, common status include active, expired, pending, suspended.

effectiveTimePeriod.description: The time period for which the certificate is valid and considered active.

issued.description: The most recent issue date of the certificate. This might be of relevance if it differs from the start date of the valid time period or is a renewal of a previous certificate.

firstIssued.description: The original issue date of the certificate. Often this is useful when the certificates need to be renewed often, and it is important to know how long the certificate has been held.

issuingAuthority.description: The organization that issued the certificate.

attachmentReferences.description: References to attachments in the message that provide evidence of the issue or the validity of the license.

RefereeType.title: RefereeType
RefereeType.description: A person who may be referred to for information or guidance on the character or other qualities of someone e.g. an applicant for employment or for an academic or other award.

positionTitle.description: The job title of the Referee.

organizationName.description: The associated company or organization of the Referee.

communication.description: The communication to be used to reach the Referee.

yearsKnown.description: The number of years to which the Referee has been known to the person.

relationship.description: The relationship of the Referee to the person.

attachmentReferences.description: A reference to an attachment related to the Referee and the person.

comments.description: Comments related to the Referee and the person.

MilitaryServiceType.title: MilitaryServiceType
MilitaryServiceType.description: History of military service. Service or employment in a military branch.

countryCode.description: The country to which this military service was performed.

serviceNumber.description: The military service number or identifier of the person as defined by the country, branch, and/or division.

branch.description: The military office or department in which the person served; e.g. army, navy.

division.description: The military division as defined in the military branch and country. It could be a portion of an army or fleet, consisting of a definite number of troops or vessels, under one commanding officer; also applied to a definite portion of a squadron or battalion.

startingRank.description: The rank which the person held in the military service at the beginning of the service period.

endingRank.description: The rank which the person held at the end of the military service period.

currentRankIndicator.description: An indicator that the rank is currently held as part of active service. Do not use this indicator if the person is no longer holding this rank.

campaigns.description: A list of campaigns to which the person was involved during the service period.

expertises.description: A list of expertise that the person developed during the service period.

honors.description: A list of honors that the person received during the service period.

disciplinaryActions.description: A list of disciplinary actions taken during the service period.

dischargeStatus.description: If this is not a currently held service, the discharge status for the service period. E.g. honorable, dishonorable, general.

dischargeDate.description: If this is not a currently held service, the date of discharge.

comments.description: Additional comments about the military service history.

EmployerHistoryType.title: EmployerHistoryType
EmployerHistoryType.description: The prior and current details of a person's employment, work, or relevant experience such as might be reported within a professional profile, CV, resume, employment application, or similar document. Details of a particular tenure of employment or work with an organization.

PositionHistoryType.title: PositionHistoryType
PositionHistoryType.description: The details about a persons tenure within position.

title.description: The title that the person held for this position.

resourceRelationshipCode.description: The relationship of the person to the organization - an employee or an employee of another company (contract or temporary staffing).

organization.description: The department, sub-company, office, or other sub-organization to which the person was employed.

location.description: The location of the position to which the person was employed.

jobCategories.description: The job categories under which the position is classified. These may be international, national, industry, or company categories as defined by the entity owner.

jobLevels.description: The job levels under which this position is classified. These may be international, national, industry or company levels as defined by the entity owner.

organization.description: The specific organization to which the person held positions or performed work.

positionHistories.description: The set of positions that the person held at the organization.

EducationAttendanceType.title: EducationAttendanceType
EducationAttendanceType.description: Contains details documenting a person's attendance at an educational institution. (OED Institution, n. An establishment, organization, or association, instituted for the promotion of education.)

type.description: Type of specialization, e.g. 'major', 'minor'.

EducationDegreeType.title: EducationDegreeType
EducationDegreeType.description: Contains details about the student's degree. A degree is a recognized completion of studies at a school (such as a college or university). A certificate, which may be a diploma or degree, is generally issued in recognition of having completed the course of study.

id.description: Identifier for the degree.

name.description: Name for the degree.

specializations.description: The focus of study for the student's degree. This may include majors, minors, emphasis or other foci.

iscedEducationLevelCode.description: ISCED: International Standard Classification of Education - is the standard classification of the education level of this attendance.

institution.description: The institution to which the person attended.

department.description: The department at the institution to which the person attended.

programs.description: The list of programs to which the person attended.

educationLevelCodes.description: The identifier to the level of the education attendance. This could be country-specific or industry-specific classifications.

currentlyAttendingIndicator.description: Indicator that the person is still attending.

goodStandingIndicator.description: Indicator that the person is currently in good standing according to the rules of the educational institution.

educationDegrees.description: The degrees which were awarded or in process at the institution.

start.description: The start date of the additional attendance period if known.

end.description: The end date of the additional attendance period if known.

profileName.description: The name given to the profile.

languageCode.description: The primary language of the content of the profile.

education.description: The education history of the person.

employment.description: The employment history of the person.

militaryService.description: The military history of the person.

licenses.description: The licenses that the person holds.

certifications.description: The certifications that the person holds.

patents.description: The patents with which the person is involved.

publications.description: The publications with which the person is involved.

affiliations.description: The organizations with which the person is affiliated.

securityCredentials.description: The security credentials that the person holds.

attachments.description: Attachments or online references related to the person's profile.

ResourceClassificationInclusion.title: ResourceClassificationInclusion
ResourceClassificationInclusion.description: Holds customer specific properties of an entity.

EmploymentPermitType.title: EmploymentPermitType
EmploymentPermitType.description: A type that gives information on the permissions of a person to work.

countrySubDivisions.description: Qualifies the further divisions of the country. These may be districts, regions, states, provinces, etc.

WorkerType.title: WorkerType
WorkerType.description: Worker is a Person Role and is defined as someone who performs labor for an organization. Worker is an abstraction for other more specific work-related roles, for example, Employee and Contractor. (ADP)

workerId.description: Provides a unique identifier to a specific worker (an employer specific identifier).

person.description: Information about the person, e.g. name, birthdate, legal ids, marital status, etc.

workAssignments.description: The assignments for the worker. An assignment may override the position and/or job information.

primaryWorkLocation.description: The primary address where the work is performed.

workerTypeCode.description: The relationship of the worker to the organization. Options are Employee, Vendor Employee, Independent Contractor, Volunteer.

workRelationshipStatus.description: The date and status of the worker in relation to the assignment.

wageHourLawCoverageIndicator.description: This determines if a person is covered by wage hour laws. In the US, a person would be considered non-exempt if the indicator is true (they are covered under the law).

laborBargainingUnitIndicator.description: Indicates if the person is part of a labor bargaining unit, such as a union.

unemploymentCompensationCoverageIndicato.description: An indicator of whether the employee is covered by some type of unemployment insurance.

workerCompensationCoverageIndicator.description: An indicator of whether the employee is covered by some type of worker compensation insurance.

officerIndicator.description: Indicates whether the worker is classified as an officer.

stockOwnerIndicator.description: Indicates whether the worker is a stock owner.

workerLifeCyle.description: Contains a collection of information about a period of employment, including hire, leaves of absence, and termination.

payCycleIntervalCode.description: How often the pay cycle occurs or how often a person is paid, e.g., weekly, biweekly, etc.

PositionType_1.title: PositionType
PositionType_1.description: A type that defines a position type and related identifiers.

PositionStatusCodeList.title: PositionStatusCodeList
PositionStatusCodeList.description: A value defining the status of the position.
enumNames: Authorized to hire for the position
Vacant but not currently being filled

id.description: An identifier for a position.

remunerationBasisCode.description: A code classifying the primary method by which remuneration for a position is provided or calculated. Examples include Hourly, Salaried, Salaried plus Commission, Commission Only, Salaried plus Bonus, etc.

positionScheduleType.description: The type of position schedule. Values include FullTime, PartTime, SharedTime and FlexTime.

positionTypeCode.description: Deprecated for the Employee Earnings specifications in 4.3 release. Use PositionTermType instead. Other domains will review in future releases. The code of the position type. Values include DirectHire, Temporary, Contract, Internship, Seasonal, etc.

positionTermTypeCode.description: The code of the term of the position. Values include Fixed, Permanent, Casual, Seasonal.

permanentEligibleIndicator.description: An arrangement where a worker is hired on a short-term contract on the condition that they may be hired for a permanent position.

fillByContractorIndicator.description: Indicates that this position should be filled by an independent or third party contractor.

fillByStudentIndicator.description: Indicates that this position should be filled by a student.

fillByVolunteerIndicator.description: Indicates that this position should be filled by a volunteer.

positionStatusCode.description: Defines the status of the position. Options may be Approved, Active,  Filled, Frozen, Cancelled.

careerLevelCode.description: The code representing the career level.

WorkRelationshipStatusType.title: WorkRelationshipStatusType
WorkRelationshipStatusType.description: The status of the worker in relation to the assignment.

separatedIndicator.description: Indicates the worker has been separated from the organization.

declinedToProvideIndicator.description: Indicates the employer has declined to provide a status.

statusCode.description: The status of the worker in relation to the assignment. Values are Pending, Active, Inactive, Terminated.

statusDate.description: The date on which the worker's status changed.

description.description: A description of the status.

reasonCode.description: The employer's reason for the work relationship status.

WorkLifeCycleType.title: WorkLifeCycleType
WorkLifeCycleType.description: Contains a collection of information about a period of employment, including hire, leaves of absence, and termination.

ContractType.description: Describes the relationship between the employer and worker.

contractStartDate.description: The start date for the contract.

contractEndDate.description: The end date for the contract.

workRelationshipType.description: This property is deprecated starting with release 4.3. Use ResourceRelationshipCodeList instead.

date.description: The first date the person is classed as a worker.

firstWorkDate.description: The actual first date the person starts work.

expectedFirstWorkDate.description: The first date is expected to start work.

probationaryStartDate.description: The first day of a worker's probationary status.

probationaryEndDate.description: The last day of a worker's probationary status.

reasonCode.description: Retirement, Voluntary (subcategory), Involuntary (subcategory), Transfer, Business Sold. In EU - info must be sent to government but the codes are provided by the government. Will use IdentifierType. This allows us to define who owns the list and the list value.

date.description: Date the contract is complete or the worker is terminated.

lastWorkedDate.description: May need for statutory purposes. For example, we will pay you through end of month but your last worked day was on the 15th. Access turned off, etc from an HR perspective.

lastPaidDate.description: The date the worker was last paid. High level workers that have terminated but the salary may carry on for a few more months. Or Date the recurring payment is turned off.

intendedDate.description: Last day the worker is intending to work.

reasonCode.description: The reason the person is on leave.

lastWorkedDate.description: The last day on which a worker worked for pay.

lastPaidDate.description: The date the person was last paid before going on leave.

scheduledWorkReturnDate.description: The date the person is scheduled to return to work.

workReturnDate.description: The date the person returned to work.

incurServicesOnLeaveIndicator.description: Determination if the person can continue to use their benefits for new expenses incurred while they are on leave.

RecruitingAndStaffingType.description: Provides recruiting and staffing key date information.

applicationDate.description: The date of the application submission by the candidate.

rejectionDate.description: The date of the application was rejected or withdrawn.

rejectionReasonCode.description: The reason for the application rejection or withdrawal.

offeredOnDate.description: The date that the initial offer was made.

offerAcceptedDate.description: The date that the final offer was accepted.

JobType.title: JobType
JobType.description: A job serves as a template for more specifically defined positions and assignments in a company, in part, to provide equitable opportunity for similar work done across disparate business units inside and outside the organization

id.description: The id of the job.

categoryCode.description: A code classifying the job category code. Examples include Officials And Managers, Professionals, Technicians, Sales, Official And Clerical, Craft Worker Skilled, Operative Semi-Skilled, Laborers Unskilled, Service Workers, etc.

jobFunction.description: A code classifying the job function e.g., HR, Finance, Marketing, Sales, Product Development, etc.

planCode.description: Identifies a specific salary structure or program used either throughout, or in specific segments of, an enterprise.

gradeCode.description: Defines the salary range or band that a job falls within, based on the formal structure. Formal pay structures are less common today than in the past, but remain common in certain sectors, such as in public-sector employment and in employment covered by collective bargaining agreements.

stepCode.description: Pinpoints a job's specific level or point within a salary range or band.

managerIndicator.description: Specifies if the job is at the management level.

managerLevel.description: If this is a manager level job, this describes the type of management level, ie. Supervisor, First Line, Senior Officer, CEO, etc.

wageHourLawCoverageIndicator.description: This determines if a person is covered by wage hour laws. In the US, a person would be considered non-exempt if the indicator is true (they are covered under the law).

standardHours.description: The typical hours required for this job. For example, 40 hour per week or 2080 hours per year.

occupationId.description: Classifies workers into occupational categories for the purpose of collecting, calculating, or disseminating data.

jobResponsibilities.description: Describes the tasks and responsibilities of a job.

requiredEducationAndExperience.description: Describes the required education and experience of a job.

requiredCompetencyIds.description: Identifiers for the essential knowledge, skills, and abilities required to perform the job at the organization.

description.description: The description of a job.

AssignmentLifeCycleType.title: AssignmentLifeCycleType
AssignmentLifeCycleType.description: Contains a collection dates related to the assignment.

startDate.description: The first date the person is classed as a worker.

expectedStartDate.description: The date the worker is expected to start working.

endDate.description: The date the contract is complete or the worker is terminated.

probationaryStartDate.description: The first day of a worker's probationary status.

probationaryEndDate.description: The last day of a worker's probationary status.

DeploymentType.title: DeploymentType
DeploymentType.description: Contains a collection of information about the work of a human resource within an employment or work context. Deployment details include information about a resource's job, position, work schedule, assignment entry reason, as well as information identifying the organization and/or organizational sub-units associated with the deployment.

WorkerAssignmentSourceType.description: Defines the source of the worker and related assignment. For example, the source might be expatriate with the home country in Germany but the person is working in Belgium.

sourceCode.description: Describes the worker relationship to their native country; e.g. Domestic, Inpatriate, Expatriate, Local National, Third Country National

homeCountry.description: The native country of the person.

hostCountry.description: The country where the person is working.

SpecialClassificationType.description: A special classification of the Employee e.g. a VIP, Owner, Highly Compensated, Stock Owner, Executive, Officer, etc.

code.description: A code indicating the special classification.

indicator.description: An indicator of the special classification.

percentage.description: The percentage of a person's allocation that is considered the special classification.

type.description: Type of Reporting Code Example, Division, Location, Class

value.description: Reporting Code

deploymentId.description: Provides a unique identifier to a specific deployment. This may be used when a person has multiple deployments within an organization. For example, a coach and math teacher at a school.

workerAssignmentSource.description: Defines the source of the worker and related assignment.

workLocation.description: The location of the workers assignment.

communication.description: Contact information, such as phone, address, etc. for the organization.

resourceRelationshipCode.description: Describes the relationship between the employer and worker, e.g. Employee, Vendor Employee.

job.description: Represents the specific job (position) at an organization and related identifiers and classifications.

position.description: Defines a position and related identifiers.

scheduledHours.description: Do Not Use. This property will be removed in the next major release. Please use ScheduleHours property instead.

scheduleHours.description: The hours a person is scheduled to work.

workSchedule.description: The schedule a person is planned to work.

assignmentReasonCode.description: The reason a person is assigned to the position, e.g. Hire, Transfer, Promotion, etc.

fullTimeEquivalentRatio.description: The number of total hours worked divided by the maximum number of compensable hours in a full-time schedule as defined by law.

effectivePeriod.description: The period the deployment is effective.

employeeReportingCode.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the employeeReportingCodes array instead.

employeeReportingCodes.description: Allows further classification of the employee using employer or program-specific codes and controlled vocabularies. This information may be collected to use for return reporting back to the employer.

specialClassifications.description: A special classification of the Employee.

specialProvisions.description: Any special provisions for the Employee.

wageHourLawCoverageCountryCode.description: The country the wage hour laws pertain to.

wageHourLawCoverageIndicator.description: This determines if a person is covered by wage hour laws. In the US, a person would be considered non-exempt if the indicator is true (they are covered under the law).

laborBargainingUnitIndicator.description: Indicates if the person is part of a labor bargaining unit, such as a union.

laborBargainingUnitCode.description: Code of the labor bargaining unit; e.g. Unison.

laborBargainingUnitMemberId.description: The person's id within the labor bargaining unit.

newHireProbationaryIndicator.description: Indicates if the person is a new hire.

newHireProbationaryDuration.description: The length of the probation for the new hire; e.g. Hire is on probation for three months from start date.

organization.description: The organization the person is working for.

license.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the licenses array instead.

licenses.description: Any licenses the person carries for the related position.

certification.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the certifications array instead.

certifications.description: Any certifications the person carries for the related position.

statusEffectiveDate.description: The status effective date of this deployment.

intervalCode.description: The frequency at which an earning is 'earned'. E.g. how often the worker is paid the associated earning.

DisabilityType.title: DisabilityType
DisabilityType.description: Describes a disability associated with a specified person. Want of ability to discharge a function. Incapacity in the eye of the law.

DisabilityLevelCodeList.title: DisabilityLevelCodeList
DisabilityLevelCodeList.description: A value classifying the level of disability.
enumNames: need for another person's assistance with daily life tasks
inability to perform one or more sensory or physical functions
experiencing difficulties in multiple sensory or physical functions
experiencing difficulty in just one function

DisabilitySummaryType.title: DisabilitySummaryType
DisabilitySummaryType.description: Describes a disability associated with a specified person. Want of ability to discharge a function. Incapacity in the eye of the law.

disabilityId.description: An identifier of the persons disability recognition, e.g. the number of the persons 'severely handicapped pass'.

disabilityLevelCode.description: A value classifying the level of disability.

percentage.description: The amount of disability as a percentage of impairment. This should be defined by a medical board based on standards.

disabilityType.description: A value from an external code list classifying the type of disability. Examples: 1. DisabilityConditionType as defined by PESC.org; 2. U.S. Office of Special Education Programs (OSEP) Primary and Secondary Disability Codes; 3. 'Total', 'Partial', and 'Residual' as broad classifications of disability in certain contexts (Acord.org).

disabilityDate.description: The date on which an injury occurred or which is otherwise associated as the start of a period of disability.

disabilityCertifiedDate.description: The date on which a person's disabled status is verified by a doctor or medical professional.

recoveryDate.description: The date on which a person is determined to have recovered from an injury or disability.

accommodationTypeCode.description: A code identifying a type of assistance or technology required to accommodate a disability. This is a value from an external code list.

effectiveDate.description: Effective date of the defined disability.

attachmentReferences.description: Attachment references supporting the disability summary.

indicator.description: An indicator of a disability associated with a specified person.

summary.description: A summary of a disability associated with a specified person.

EmployeeType.title: EmployeeType
EmployeeType.description: This entire schema has been deprecated. The data has been added to Common/Deployment.  The information about a person and their relationship as an employee.

SpecialClassificationTypeArray.description: A special classification of the Employee e.g. a VIP, Owner, Highly Compensated, Stock Owner, Executive, Officer, etc.

code.description: A code indicating the special classification.

indicator.description: An indicator of the special classification.

percentage.description: The percentage of a person's allocation that is considered the special classification.

positionTypeCode.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the PositionTypeCode in PositionType or Deployment/PositionType instead.

laborBargainingUnitMemberIndicator.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the LaborBargainingUnitIndicator in DeploymentType instead.

reportingCode.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the EmployeeReportingCode in DeploymentType instead.

WorkAssignmentType.title: WorkAssignmentType
WorkAssignmentType.description: WorkAssignment may associate a Job and/or Position with a Worker.

id.description: Identifier of the assignment.

description.description: Describes the assignment.

assignmentTermTypeCode.description: The code of the assignment term. Values include Fixed, Permanent, Casual, Seasonal.

assignmentLifeCyle.description: Contains a collection of dates related to the assignment.

jobId.description: Indentifier of the specific job at an organization.

positionId.description: Indentifier of the specific position at an organization.

payCycleCode.description: Describes how often the payee is paid. Pay Frequency - The period of time covered by the employee's regular pay checks. (EER WG, HR-Open Data Element Requirements) (xmi_attribute)

StaffingReferenceIdsType.title: StaffingReferenceIdsType
StaffingReferenceIdsType.description: A collection of identifiers related to a staffing assignment of a resource.

assignmentId.description: An identifier for a particular engagement or assignment of a staffing resource.

requestForQuotationId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingRFQ document.

quoteId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingQuote document.

actionId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingAction document.

masterOrderId.description: Reference to a master order or project. Used to associate multiple orders.

ScoreTextType.title: ScoreTextType
ScoreTextType.description: A non-numeric or textual representation of a Score.

scoreTextCode.description: Default: CourseGrade. A code used to textually classify the type scoring methodology or convention.

BaseScoreType.title: BaseScoreType
BaseScoreType.description: Type object to contain either numeric or text scores.

ScoreNumericType.title: ScoreNumericType
ScoreNumericType.description: A numeric measurement of abilities or capacity to learn.

interval.description: The stop points between minimum and maximum.

minimum.description: Optional. Indicates lower value for a range.

maximum.description: Optional. Indicates upper value for a range.

SocialType.title: SocialType
SocialType.description: The entity's unique social network URL which is a place where the person can be reached.

handle.description: The handle or identifier of the entity on the social network.

url.description: The fully qualified web address of the entity on the social network

type.description: Specify purpose of this extension (province, secondary line, house number, etc).

value.description: Actual component value.

SocialTypeArray.title: SocialTypeArray
SocialTypeArray.description: Array of social network information details.

countryDialingCode.description: The country dialing code for a communication number.

areaDialingCode.description: The area dialing code for a communication number.

dialNumber.description: The communication number, not including country dialing or area dialing codes.

phoneExtension.description: The extension of the associated communication number.

access.description: The text that permits access to the electronic network of the associated communication number such as telephone network, for example 9, *70.

formattedNumber.description: Specifies details of an actual formatted number.

name.description: Provide description for particular communication item.

useCode.description: Code identifying the usage of the contact point e.g. business, private, etc.

preference.description: Provide priority for given communication item.

JurisdictionType.title: JurisdictionType
JurisdictionType.description: Defines a geographical area and associated legal or cultural context.

countrySubDivisions.description: Subdivision for the jurisdiction, e.g. Province, State, County, Parish.

CommunicationType.title: CommunicationType
CommunicationType.description: Allows capture of information about a variety of communication channels (telephone, email, fax, messaging, address, etc.).

address.description: An array of the address, which is the physical or mailing address of the entity.

phone.description: An array of the phone numbers of the entity.

email.description: An array of the email addresses of the entity.

web.description: An array of the web sites or web addresses of the entity.

social.description: An array of the social media handles or identifiers of the entity.

AddressType.title: AddressType
AddressType.description: The physical or mailing address of the entity. This may include the street and building number, city, region (state, province, etc), country and postal code.

extendedLines.description: Extended address components (e.g. apartment or suite number).

countrySubDivisions.description: Qualifies the further divisions of the Country. These may be Districts, Regions, States, Provinces etc.

WorkLocationCodeList.title: WorkLocationCodeList
WorkLocationCodeList.description: A set of codes classifying the work location.

PositionTypeCodeList.title: PositionTypeCodeList
PositionTypeCodeList.description: Deprecated for the Employee Earnings specifications in 4.3 release. Use PositionTermType, or appropriate indicators in PositionType. Other domains will review in future releases. These are values that are descriptive in classifying a position or a position opportunity or "offering". They are not precise classes useful internally to drive pay, benefits, or HR compliance. Enumerated values are: DirectHire, Temporary, TemporaryToHire, ContractToHire, Contract, Internship, Externship, Apprenticeship, Seasonal, Student, and Volunteer. Consider that "Temporary" and "DirectHire" are not parallel concepts, but are still commonly used in classifying jobs within advertising.

GenderCodeList.title: GenderCodeList
enumNames: The person does not identify explicity with male or female.

AffiliatedOrganizationTypeCodeList.title: AffiliatedOrganizationTypeCodeList
AffiliatedOrganizationTypeCodeList.description: Values used to describe the type of association or affiliated organization.

EducationDegreeGrantedStatusCodeList.title: EducationDegreeGrantedStatusCodeList
EducationDegreeGrantedStatusCodeList.description: Values that classify the education degree granted status.

ObjectiveActionCodeList.title: ObjectiveActionCodeList
ObjectiveActionCodeList.description: A code classifying an action to be taken with respect to achieving an objective. This may be used in the definition or specification of an objective or objective plan.

TimeOffTypeCodeList.title: TimeOffTypeCodeList
TimeOffTypeCodeList.description: Specifies type of absence from work. Includes compensatory time off (CTO) when used.

CountryCodeList.title: CountryCodeList
CountryCodeList.description: Two letter country codes as defined by ISO 3166-1:2013. Content referenced from Wikipedia.
enumNames: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF

WeekdayCodeList.title: WeekdayCodeList
WeekdayCodeList.description: Values that classify the various days of week.

PayCycleIntervalCodeList.title: PayCycleIntervalCodeList
PayCycleIntervalCodeList.description: PayCycleInterval specifies how often the pay cycle occurs or, in other words, how often a person is paid, e.g., weekly, biweekly, etc. This is a different concept than an interval used in expressing a rate of pay.

ScheduledHoursCodeList.title: ScheduledHoursCodeList
ScheduledHoursCodeList.description: Values that classify the various scheduled hours types.

PositionTermTypeCodeList.title: PositionTermTypeCodeList
PositionTermTypeCodeList.description: The term of the work agreement or position. Options are Fixed, Permanent, Casual, Seasonal.
enumNames: Ends on a specified date or when a particular event occurs.
Has the full set of employment rights and responsibilities. This may be full or part time.
Used for unpredictable workloads, project work, seasonal peaks, and other limited-term needs, such as a leave of absence.
A type of fixed-term employment where the employment agreement says that the work will finish at the end of the season.

TimeOffsetList.title: TimeOffsetList
TimeOffsetList.description: Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), from the westernmost (12:00) to the easternmost (+14:00).

AgencyRoleCodeList.title: AgencyRoleCodeList
AgencyRoleCodeList.description: A code classifying the role of an entity or the role with which that entity is associated.

WorkerAssignmentSourceCodeList.title: WorkerAssignmentSourceCodeList
WorkerAssignmentSourceCodeList.description: Values that classify the various worker assignment source codes.

CurrencyCodeList.title: CurrencyCodeList
CurrencyCodeList.description: ISO 4217 is the International Standard for currency codes. The most recent edition is ISO 4217:2015.
enumNames: Bond Markets Unit European Composite Unit (EURCO)
Bond Markets Unit European Monetary Unit (E.M.U.-6)
Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 9 (E.U.A.-9)
Bond Markets Unit European Unit of Account 17 (E.U.A.-17)
Codes specifically reserved for testing purposes
The codes assigned for transactions where no currency is involved

UnitCodeList.title: UnitCodeList
UnitCodeList.description: A partial list of UN/CEFACT Unit Codes for Trade (2014, Annex II & Annex III).

RelationshipTypeCodeList.title: RelationshipTypeCodeList
RelationshipTypeCodeList.description: Values used to describe the type of relationship of a reference.

RemunerationBasisCodeList.title: RemunerationBasisCodeList
RemunerationBasisCodeList.description: A code classifying the primary method of payment for the associated position or employment. This classifies the method by which remuneration for a position is provided or calculated.

ResourceRelationshipCodeList.title: ResourceRelationshipCodeList
enumNames: A paid position with all related benefits.
A worker hired by a third party such as a consulting agency.
A worker with a contract signed directly by the employer.
A paid or voluntary position with an organization for someone who is learning a profession and industry.
An unpaid shadowing of a respected industry professional during which the extern will observe daily duties.
A kind of job training that involves following and studying a master of the trade on the job instead of in school.

PositionScheduleTypeCodeList.title: PositionScheduleTypeCodeList
PositionScheduleTypeCodeList.description: Values that classify the working schedule of a position offered or a position sought. Essentially, whether a position offered or sought is full-time or part-time or has provision for flexible scheduling. Shared Time is meant to indicate a single position that is shared amongst more than one person. Intended to classify schedule position preferences of a candidate or conversely employer preferences or requirements related to candidates with respect to an advertised position. Used in the context of matching candidates to positions.

PayRateIntervalCodeList.title: PayRateIntervalCodeList
PayRateIntervalCodeList.description: An interval of time or other basis used to express a rate of pay, remuneration, or deduction. OED: Interval, n.  2. a. The space of time intervening between two points of time; any intervening time. TwoWeek24 applies when there are 24 deductions within the year and TwoWeek26 applies when there are 26 deductions within the year.

CareerLevelCodeList.title: CareerLevelCodeList
CareerLevelCodeList.description: A code classifying the level of a candidate based on career experience. Student, Entry Level, Recent Graduate, Mid-Career, Manager, Experienced Non-Manager, Senior Executive

PayTypeCodeList.title: PayTypeCodeList
PayTypeCodeList.description: Values that classify the various pay types.

CompensationCareerLevelCodeList.title: CompensationCareerLevelCodeList
CompensationCareerLevelCodeList.description: A set of codes classifying the compensation career level codes.

IscedCodeList.title: IscedCodeList
IscedCodeList.description: The International Standard Classification of Education (ISCED) is a scheme developed by the UN to provide a normalized, international set of values for classifying the level of a school or institution. Version from year 2011.

ScoreNumericCodeList.title: ScoreNumericCodeList
ScoreNumericCodeList.description: A set of enumerations describing the numeric type of scoring scheme.

LanguageCodeList.title: LanguageCodeList
LanguageCodeList.description: This list is based on Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) RFC 4646 and RFC 4647 for language tags. This tag system is extensible to region, dialect, and private designations. The IANA Language Subtag Registry is a source of the tag values. See http://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry
enumNames: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic
Macedonian, Macedonia (Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia)
Mongolian (Traditional Mongolian), People's Republic of China

TextType.title: TextType
TextType.description: Text is a character string, such as a finite set of characters, generally in the form of words of a language.

value.description: The text.

AttachmentType.title: AttachmentType
AttachmentType.description: Embedded attachment data or URL to actual attachment.

AttachmentContent.title: AttachmentContent
AttachmentContent.description: Content of an attachment in the JSON message, which can be embedded or an external reference.

content.description: Embedded attachment represented as a binary object.

url.description: A URL to an external document.

id.description: An identifier of the attachment.

descriptions.description: Descriptions of the attachment.

LocalizationInclusion.title: LocalizationInclusion
LocalizationInclusion.description: Can be used for any entity to specify localization language code.

YearMonthOpenEndPeriodType.title: YearMonthOpenEndPeriodType
YearMonthOpenEndPeriodType.description: Single period between year/months. The end year/month is optional and should be used in cases where the end of the period is unknown or uncertain.

CommentType.title: CommentType
CommentType.description: A comment to provide additional information concerning the related entity.

type.description: A label describing the type of comment.

author.description: The name of an author of a comment.

datetime.description: The date and time that the comment was made.

MeasureType.title: MeasureType
MeasureType.description: A measure is a numeric value determined by measuring an object along with the specified unit of measure.

value.description: The numeric value of the measure.

YearMonthType.title: YearMonthType
YearMonthType.description: A single year and month, in the format YYYY-MM

MonthType.title: MonthType
MonthType.description: A single month, in the format MM from 01-12

YearPeriodType.title: YearPeriodType
YearPeriodType.description: Single period between years. Both start and end are required.

PercentType.title: PercentType
PercentType.description: A percent is a value representing a fraction of one hundred, expressed as a quotient.

DateOpenEndPeriodType.title: DateOpenEndPeriodType
DateOpenEndPeriodType.description: Single period between dates. The end date is optional and should be used in cases where the end of the period is unknown or uncertain.

DateTimePeriodType.title: DateTimePeriodType
DateTimePeriodType.description: Single period between date/times. Both start and end are required.

NameType.title: NameType
NameType.description: A name is a word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept.

OpenEndPeriodType.title: OpenEndPeriodType
OpenEndPeriodType.description: Single date/timespan/month/year or period between two dates/months/years. The end date is optional and should be used in cases where the end of the period is unknown or uncertain.

AmountType.title: AmountType
AmountType.description: An amount is a number of monetary units specified in a currency.

value.description: The value of the amount.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographical location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographical location.

altitude.description: The altitude of the geographical location. Defaults to meters above sea level in case no unitCode provided.

name.description: The label of the geo coordinates.

IndicatorType.title: IndicatorType
IndicatorType.description: An indicator is a list of two mutually exclusive boolean values that express the only possible states of a property.

RateType.title: RateType
RateType.description: Used to represent the numerical quotient resulting from a comparison of two independent things such as a quantity measured with respect to another measured quantity.

value.description: The value of the rate.

unitCode.description: The unit code of the value.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the value.

baseMultiplier.description: The base multiplier of the value.

baseUnitCode.description: The base unit code of the value.

baseCurrencyCode.description: The base currency code of the value.

CodeType.title: CodeType
CodeType.description: A code is a character string of letters, numbers, special characters (except escape sequences), and symbols. It represents a definitive value, a method, or a property description in an abbreviated or language-independent form that is part of a finite list of allowed values. Use this schema when there is a defined list of values but the owner is unknown or private, the values may not be referenced, or there is no validation possible.

YearOpenEndPeriodType.title: YearOpenEndPeriodType
YearOpenEndPeriodType.description: Single period between years. The end year is optional and should be used in cases where the end of the period is unknown or uncertain.

EntityType.title: EntityType
EntityType.description: A description of an entity with id, name and code.

id.description: A unique identifier which cannot be expressed as enumeration.

name.description: Free text description for that entity.

code.description: A code which can be expressed as enumeration.

StatusType.title: StatusType
StatusType.description: Provide a status for an entity.

statusDate.description: The date on which the status changed.

description.description: A description of the status.

DatePeriodType.title: DatePeriodType
DatePeriodType.description: Single period between dates. Both start and end are required.

DataProtectionPolicyInclusion.title: DataProtectionPolicyInclusion
DataProtectionPolicyInclusion.description: Data protection policy according General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (Regulation (EU) 2016/679).

retentionDate.description: Date until allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDays' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

retentionDays.description: Number of days allowed to keep privacy data. In case 'retentionDate' is also present, earlier one is taken as retention limit. In case of no retention property present, data can be kept indefinitely.

geoRestrictions.description: Data can be processed only in countries from this list. In case not present, there is no country restriction associated with data.

country.description: The Country (represented by an ISO 3166 2 letter code) under which the data protection policy applies. If the policy applies to the world, the country is optional.

countrySubDivisions.description: An optional further restriction or application of the data protection policy based on a region within the associated country. It should contain an ISO 3166-2 code for the country. Example would be 'US-CA' for California for further restrictions based on the CCPA regulation.

policy.description: The description of the data protection policy (optionally associated with the country and optional region).

NounType.title: NounType
NounType.description: A common type that should be included at the top level of schemas.

documentId.description: Provides the Identifier(s) of the document being communicated. Uniquely identifies a Document within an organization.

YearMonthPeriodType.title: YearMonthPeriodType
YearMonthPeriodType.description: Single period between year/months. Both start and end are required.

IdentifierType.title: IdentifierType
IdentifierType.description: An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency. Use this type when the list or values are controlled by an external entity, the list or values are public and could be referenced or validated.

value.description: The identifier.

schemeId.description: The identification of the identifier scheme.

schemeVersionId.description: The identification of the version of the identifier scheme.

schemeAgencyId.description: The identification of the agency that manages the identifier scheme.

description.description: The description of the identifier.

schemeLink.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme data is located.

agencyUri.description: The URI that identifies where the identification scheme is located.

EffectiveTimePeriodType.title: EffectiveTimePeriodType
EffectiveTimePeriodType.description: A time period in which an associated object is effective.

DayOfMonthType.title: DayOfMonthType
DayOfMonthType.description: A day within the month, in the format DD (01-31)

AttachmentReferenceType.title: AttachmentReferenceType
AttachmentReferenceType.description: A reference to an attachment that is within the current context of the document, or an external reference.

reference.description: An identifier or reference to a document.

uri.description: An internal reference (typically a JSON pointer reference).

descriptions.description: Descriptions of the attachment reference.

RatioType.title: RatioType
RatioType.description: Relation between two independent quantities, using the same unit.

PeriodType.title: PeriodType
PeriodType.description: Single date/timespan/month/year or period between two dates/months/years.

IdGroupType.title: IdGroupType
IdGroupType.description: A set of identifiers for an object, with a primary identifier and an array of alternate identifiers.

BinaryObjectType.title: BinaryObjectType
BinaryObjectType.description: A binary object is a sequence of binary digits (bits) to represent a file. It is recommended to use base64 encoding.

DateTimeOpenEndPeriodType.title: DateTimeOpenEndPeriodType
DateTimeOpenEndPeriodType.description: Single period between date/times. The end date/time is optional and should be used in cases where the end of the period is unknown or uncertain.

TextTypeArray.title: TextTypeArray
TextTypeArray.description: Array of TextType data - for providing a multilingual textual representation.

DurationType.title: DurationType
DurationType.description: A duration is the specification of a length of time without a fixed start or end time.

oneOf.description: Decimal value in seconds.
ISO 8601 time duration format.

NumberType.title: NumberType
NumberType.description: A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.

QuantityType.title: QuantityType
QuantityType.description: A quantity is a counted number of non-monetary units, possibly including fractions.

value.description: The number of quantity.

FormattedDateTimeType.title: FormattedDateTimeType
FormattedDateTimeType.description: This is formatted representation of a date, which may be specified as a date, date/time, year, or year/month.

OrdinalType.title: OrdinalType
OrdinalType.description: An ordinal number is an assigned mathematical number that represents order or sequence.

ProcessHistoryItemType.title: ProcessHistoryItemType
ProcessHistoryItemType.description: Describes a single workflow process history step or item.

id.description: The identifier for the history item.

actionDate.description: The date and time that the action was executed or the event occurred or the step was completed.

action.description: The executed action that occurred on the step or item by the primary parties. This action may or may not involve a status change of the underlying process. E.g. reviewed application, sent for approval, approved (which might then change status as well).

status.description: The current status of the underlying entity/process. For example, if it is an application process, the status would represent the current state of the candidate to the position opening. E.g. applied, interviewed, offered, hired.

previousStatus.description: The previous status of the underlying entity/process - relevant in a status change process. Use status only if the whole history is maintained - previousStatus may not be needed.

primaryParties.description: The parties executing the action. For example, the company, the hiring manager, the HR manager, etc.

associatedParties.description: The parties additionally involved in the executed action. For example, the recruiting team or a set of people involved in an interview step. They are not the ones making the decision, but may be influencers or need to be informed.

attachments.description: Attachments related to the history item.

descriptions.description: Additional details or descriptions about the history item.

ProcessActionType.title: ProcessActionType
ProcessActionType.description: The type of action, process, or step that was executed.

name.description: The name of the executed action, process, or step.

code.description: The code of the executed action, process, or step.

description.description: Description of the executed action, process, or step.

ProcessStatusType.title: ProcessStatusType
ProcessStatusType.description: A type defining the status of the underlying item.

name.description: The name of the status of the underlying item.

code.description: The code of the status of the underlying item.

description.description: Description of the status of the underlying item.

ProcessPartyType.title: ProcessPartyType
ProcessPartyType.description: A type defining the party, which may be a person or organization or both.

person.description: Contains information to identify a person associated with the interaction or entity.

organization.description: Basic information to reference a specific organization.

ProcessHistoryType.title: ProcessHistoryType
ProcessHistoryType.description: Describes a workflow process history, which can be used for modelling recruiting dispositions, onboarding workflow, etc.

TimecardType.title: TimecardType
TimecardType.description: A record of time worked; associated expenses to be reimbursed; and/or allowances associated with the engagement.

StateCodeType.title: StateCodeType
StateCodeType.description: A set of codes classifying the state of a TimeCard.

ItemTypeCodeType.title: ItemTypeCodeType
ItemTypeCodeType.description: Identifies common types of time/work classification

ItemBase.title: ItemBase
ItemBase.description: Common properties used on TimeCardItem and PieceOfWork/Allowance/Expense/Balance

PieceWorkType.title: PieceWorkType
PieceWorkType.description: Contains information relating to renumeration based on count of items produced or serviced.

ExpenseType.title: ExpenseType
ExpenseType.description: This allows for the reporting of expenses for reimbursement or payment. TimeCard is not designed as an all-purpose expense-reporting format, but rather is designed to accommodate the type of expenses that are reported and reimbursed in the context of staffing assignments.

AllowanceType.title: AllowanceType
AllowanceType.description: Allows for the reporting of allowances that may be associated with the particular time worked. For example, some workers may be due per diems to cover expenses incurred during an assignment or may receive allowances to cover the cost of items such as uniforms.

BalanceType.title: BalanceType
BalanceType.description: Allows for the reporting of direct balance values.

TimeCardItemType.title: TimeCardItemType
TimeCardItemType.description: Contains data on a period of work, time event, expense, or allowance that is being reported within a time card.

WellnessType.title: WellnessType
WellnessType.description: A set of recorded activity information related to an individual. The main purpose is to allow employees to set and reach employee wellness goals within their employment organization.

WellnessRequestSummaryType.title: WellnessRequestSummaryType
WellnessRequestSummaryType.description: A summary of a wellness report related to the request.

cycleCode.description: The cycle to which the wellness is related. e.g. Day, Week, Month, Year

episodeCode.description: The period under which the activity is measured. e.g. daily, weekly, monthly.

unitCode.description: The unit of wellness being measured. e.g. steps, strokes, cycles.

categoryCode.description: A wellness category being measured. e.g. walking, swimming, running, biking.

WellnessActivityCategoryCodeList.title: WellnessActivityCategoryCodeList
WellnessActivityCategoryCodeList.description: A set of codes classifying activities related to wellness.

WellnessSummaryActivityType.title: WellnessSummaryActivityType
WellnessSummaryActivityType.description: The summary of activity related to wellness

categoryCode.description: The wellness code being evaluated. e.g. walking, swimming, running, biking.

totalRoutine.description: The total measure of routine/normal activity.

totalModerate.description: The total measure of moderate activity.

totalIntense.description: The total measure of intense activity.

units.description: The unit of wellness being measured. e.g. steps, strokes, cycles.

period.description: The period of the recorded activity.

DeviceType.title: DeviceType
DeviceType.description: A type to identify the device being used in a wellness program.

device.description: The specific device (identifier or serial number).

name.description: The name of the device.

WellnessActivityType.title: WellnessActivityType
WellnessActivityType.description: The record of an activity related to wellness.

id.description: Identifier for the wellness activity.

lastAcquisitionTime.description: The date/time of the last aquisition of data for the wellness activity.

period.description: The period to which the measured activity was recorded.

utcOffset.description: The number of hours offset of the recorded activity to UTC.

categoryCode.description: A wellness category being measured. e.g. walking, swimming, running, biking.

units.description: The unit of wellness being measured. e.g. steps, strokes, cycles.

value.description: The value of wellness being measured.

source.description: The device from which the measured value was recorded.

requestSummary.description: A summary of a wellness report related to the request.

activitySummaries.description: An array of wellness activity summaries.

ReportType.title: ReportType
ReportType.description: Represents an Assessments Report for HR Open Standards.

AssessmentResultType.description: Contains various scoring details and related metadata to interpret the scores.

packageId.description: This is a reference to the Package ID that was ordered.

name.description: This is a place to put any formal name or identifier for the result. This might be a pass-through value tied to the specific test instrument.

overallResult.description: A high-level or summary result for an assessment or appraisal. Can indicate whether or not there was a satisfactory result (PassedIndicator) as well as include some type of overall score or a `rolled up` average or weighted average of component scores.

testInstance.description: TestInstance is a set of information about the test instance actually taken by the assessment subject.

assessmentStatus.description: Code indicating the status of an assessment.

AssessmentScoreType.title: AssessmentScoreType
AssessmentScoreType.description: This is the test score type structure.

id.description: This is an identifier for the assessment score.

bandId.description: An identifier of a band, a place on a distribution of scores.

descriptions.description: Result descriptions.

TestInstanceType.title: TestInstanceType
TestInstanceType.description: TestInstance is a set of information about the test instance actually taken by the assessment subject.

documentSequence.description: The DocumentSequence serves as an identifier on the different instances of a noun in a message instance; the sequence numbers are specific to the message instance

orderId.description: AssessmentOrderId. Used to indicate the order line number on which the rate is specified.

results.description: Array of results for the assessment ordered.

assessmentResultsURL.description: Specifies the URL to retrieve assessment results.

OrderType_1.title: OrderType
OrderType_1.description: Represents an Assessments Order for HR Open Standards.

AssessmentAccessType.title: AssessmentAccessType
AssessmentAccessType.description: This is a set of information used to provide the assessment subject access to a test that has been ordered.

id.description: Identifier for an assessment access type.

assessmentCommunication.description: Communication types to communicate with an assessment subject for a test or to schedule an assessment time and place to take the test.

AssessmentPackagesType.title: AssessmentPackagesType
AssessmentPackagesType.description: Array of packages used in staged assessments.

packageId.description: Identifier to associate with the assessment.

conditions.description: Specifies conditions for progressing through multiple assessment orders

sendAssessmentResultsToURL.description: Specifies the URL to direct the candidate to after the assessment is complete.

Conditions.title: Conditions
Conditions.description: Conditions used in progression of an object/event/person

type.description: The time the condition should be processed in relation to each item in the array.

key.description: JSONPath of the property to which the condition applies.

operator.description: The operator value to initiate a comparison of the key value (JSONPath) to the supplied value

value.description: The value to compare with using the operator against the value in the key

packageId.description: Identifier to associate with the assessment.

comparisonGroupIds.description: Indicates the applicable group for comparing assessment or appraisal results.

assessmentRequesterName.description: The individual that makes the request.

subject.description: The person who will be the subject of the assessment.

assessmentLanguageCodes.description: The language in which the assessment is required.

assessmentResultLanguageCodes.description: The language in which the assessment results are required.

assessmentAccess.description: This is a set of information used to provide the assessment subject access to a test that has been ordered.

testLocationId.description: An identifier for the location of a testing site or test center where a test was taken. If a test center does not have an identifier, then the name will be used as the identifier in the value property.

assessmentAccessURL.description: The URL that the Requestor will re-direct the candidate to in order to complete the assessment.

onCompletionURL.description: Specifies the URL to direct the candidate to after the assessment is complete.

sendAssessmentResultsToURL.description: Specifies the URL to direct the candidate to after the assessment is complete.

invitationByPartyCode.description: Specifies who will send the invitation to the candidate.  Options are the Customer or the Supplier.

code.description: Specifies an optional field to be used by parties for communication of an additional piece of data such as accounting code, billing identifier, department identifier, or location information.

assessmentStatus.description: Code indicating the status of an assessment.

packages.description: Array of packages used in staged assessments.

subjectId.description: Primary identifier for the person to be assessed.The test taker or person who takes the assessment or is assessed.

internalCandidateIndicator.description: Indicates whether a subject is a candidate for a position with the customer party.

accomodationTypeCodes.description: A code identifying a type of assistance or technology required to accomodate a disability.

CatalogType.title: CatalogType
CatalogType.description: Represents an Assessments Catalog for HR Open Standards.

typeCode.description: Type code for an additional amount.

AdditionalItemType.title: AdditionalItemType
AdditionalItemType.description: Structure to define additional items between trading partners.

sequence.description: Order for the additional item to be displayed

name.description: Name of the additional item.

AssessmentAdministrationType.description: Provides details for the administration of an assessment.

AssessmentApplicabilityType.description: Provides details for the applicability of an assessment test.

applicableRegions.description: A set of information broadly describing the region(s) where the assessment is applicable or available.

assessmentTypeCodes.description: An array of assessment type codes for the test package.

assessedCompetencies.description: An array of assessment competencies for the test package.

jobCategoryCodes.description: An array of job category codes for the test package.

AssessmentFulfillmentType.description: A set of information describing options and characteristics relating to the way an assessment result is provided. For example, the language or available languages of the assessment report; the period for which the result is recognized as valid or reliable, the name or identity of the scoring profile used in calculating the result; etc.

effectivePeriod.description: The period for which the result is recognized as valid or reliable.

scoreProfileNames.description: Name or identity of the scoring profile used in calculating the result.

reportLanguageCodes.description: Available languages for the assessment report.

AssessmentPackageType.title: AssessmentPackageType
AssessmentPackageType.definition: Describes a set of component services that are marketed and can be ordered as a unit.

packageId.description: This is the 'Package ID' used to order a set of assessment services.

ids.description: This is the 'Package ID' that would be used to order a set of assessment services.

name.description: The name or terse descriptive label by which the package is referred.

descriptions.description: An array of descriptions for the package.

parentGroupIds.description: A reference from a child package to one or more associated parent entity.

partyReportingIds.description: A repeating ID set used to pass along identifiers that are used for reporting, filtering, accounting, cost center identification, and similar purposes

packageCost.description: Contains availible costs associated with the package.

additionalItems.description: Additional items that are part of the package cost.

RedirectUrlType.title: RedirectUrlType
RedirectUrlType.description: Structure for a link to an action in an assessment order and report.

uri.description: URI or URL for the redirect.

timeOut.description: Countdown for the URL to be displayed.

ServiceAvailabilityCodeList.title: ServiceAvailabilityCodeList
ServiceAvailabilityCodeList.description: A set of codes classifying the availability of an assessment package.

InvitationPartyCodeList.title: InvitationPartyCodeList
InvitationPartyCodeList.description: Specifies who will send the invitation to the assessment subject.  Options are the Customer or the Supplier.

AssessmentStatusCodeList.title: AssessmentStatusCodeList
AssessmentStatusCodeList.description: A set of codes indicating the status of an assessment The name of the assessment status.

AssessmentTypeCodeList.title: AssessmentTypeCodeList
AssessmentTypeCodeList.description: A set of codes broadly classifying the type of assessment or the principal target of what is assessed.
